title: 1200+ ping spikes
body: Every 3-4 minutes I get a ping spike over 1200 ping and will sit there for about 15 seconds before droping back to 34.  It's only started since the newest Vanguard Patch.  I've already done the random Windows 10 fixes, and this is a whole new level of lag.  Every minion and champion just runs in place.

replies.body: It sounds like you're having a network problem like packet loss.  Let's get some more info!  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get an overview of your case and see if these delays are caused by packet loss.  The results will also give some troubleshooting steps specific to your case.  Let me know what you find!
